name: Fixed-Term Engagement R&D and Renewable Energy
Appointment of Resellers in Industrial & Commercial (1&C) Business Unit of BPCL
document_links: https://www.bharatpetroleum.in/images/files/GENERAL PROCESS FOR APPOINTMENT OF RESELLERS IN INDUSTRIAL COMMERCIAL (IC) BUSINESS UNIT OF BPCL.pdf

details.process_description: The broad process of selection and appointment of Resellers is described as under: e Market potential will be scanned periodically to arrive at the proposed number of resellers required, products and the proposed geographical area for the Reseller. e The applications for appointment of Resellers shall be invited by the respective Territory Offices through a press advertisement publicizing the Notice of Appointment. e The complete details of the appointment process will simultaneously be made available on the BPCL website.
details.eligibility_criteria: Educational Qualifications, Financial Capacity, Capability to provide Infrastructure and Capability to generate business and shall be accorded marks as detailed in the marking scheme of the published process.
